## Installation

You can install the development version of **brquasi** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ikosmidis/brquasi", ref = "develop")
```

## Issues
Please use the **brquasi** [GitHub issue page](https://github.com/ikosmidis/brquasi/issues) to
report any issues or suggest enhancements or improvements.
